function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to spatial COVID-19 data for spatial mapping and visualization","Impact":"Ineffective use of GIS applications for COVID-19 tracking and mapping","Mitigation":"Increase data accessibility and develop alternative data sources for spatial mapping","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms and data visualization tools","People":"Health organizations, government agencies, research institutions","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, technology companies"},{"Description":"Requirement for change of regulations to track contact-persons","Impact":"Limitation in contact tracing capabilities for COVID-19","Mitigation":"Advocate for regulatory changes and development of privacy-preserving contact tracing technologies","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving contact tracing apps, encryption technologies","People":"Government agencies, public health authorities, technology companies","Owner":"Government agencies, technology companies"},{"Description":"Ethical framework and acceptable use of emerging technologies","Impact":"Risk of privacy violations and misuse of personal data in the context of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Develop and enforce ethical guidelines, conduct privacy impact assessments","Technologies":"Ethical AI frameworks, privacy-preserving technologies","People":"Technology developers, policymakers, ethicists","Owner":"Policymakers, technology companies"}]}
